  • Method Details

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction(Transaction t)
      This method adds a transaction to the list of transactions Calls state changed method to trigger the update for listeners.
      Parameters:
      t - Transaction object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if transaction is null

    • removeTransaction

      public void removeTransaction(Transaction t)
      This method removes a transaction from the list of transactions Calls state changed method to trigger the update for listeners.
      Parameters:
      t - Transaction object

    • getTransactions

      public List<Transaction> getTransactions()
      This method returns the list of transactions
      Returns:
      list of transactions

    • setMatchedFilterIndices

      public void setMatchedFilterIndices(List<Integer> newMatchedFilterIndices)
      Sets the indices of matched filters for transactions.
      Parameters:
      newMatchedFilterIndices - A list of indices representing matched filters for transactions. Each index must be between 0 (inclusive) and the number of transactions (exclusive).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided list is null or contains invalid indices.

    • getMatchedFilterIndices

      public List<Integer> getMatchedFilterIndices()
      Retrieves a copy of the list of indices representing matched filters for transactions.
      Returns:
      A new list containing the indices of matched filters. Modifying the returned list will not affect the internal state of the object.

    • register

      public boolean register(ExpenseTrackerModelListener listener)
      Registers the given ExpenseTrackerModelListener for state change events.
      Parameters:
      listener - The ExpenseTrackerModelListener to be registered
      Returns:
      If the listener is non-null and not already registered, returns true. If not, returns false.

    • unregister

      public boolean unregister(ExpenseTrackerModelListener listener)
      Unregisters a listener from receiving updates from the ExpenseTrackerModel.
      Parameters:
      listener - The ExpenseTrackerModelListener to be unregistered. Must not be null.
      Returns:
      true if the listener was successfully unregistered; false otherwise. Returns false if the provided listener is null or was not previously registered.

    • numberOfListeners

      public int numberOfListeners()
      Returns:
      number of listeners

    • containsListener

      public boolean containsListener(ExpenseTrackerModelListener listener)
      Checks if the provided ExpenseTrackerModelListener is currently registered as a listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - The ExpenseTrackerModelListener to check for registration. Must not be null.
      Returns:
      true if the listener is currently registered; false otherwise. Returns false if the provided listener is null or not registered.

    • stateChanged

      protected void stateChanged()
      Notifies all registered listeners that the state of the ExpenseTrackerModel has changed. This method is part of the Observable pattern and triggers an update for each listener.
